mapper.insert: insert into resource (RESOURCE_ID, `name`, url, description, icon, pid, seq, `state`, resourcetype, crt_user, crt_time, lst_upd_user, lst_upd_time, lst_upd_date, rec_status, scr_level) values (#{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resourcetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lstUpdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lstUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lstUpdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{recStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{scrLevel,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update resource set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resourcetype = #{resourcetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, crt_user = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crt_time = #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lst_upd_user = #{lstUpdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lst_upd_time = #{lstUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lst_upd_date = #{lstUpdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, rec_status = #{recStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, scr_level = #{scrLevel,jdbcType=CHAR} where RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select RESOURCE_ID, `name`, url, description, icon, pid, seq, `state`, resourcetype, crt_user, crt_time, lst_upd_user, lst_upd_time, lst_upd_date, rec_status, scr_level from resource where RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select RESOURCE_ID, `name`, url, description, icon, pid, seq, `state`, resourcetype, crt_user, crt_time, lst_upd_user, lst_upd_time, lst_upd_date, rec_status, scr_level from resource
